articles.title: Scientists discover a gigantic exoplanet nine times the size of Jupiter still 'in the womb' - Euronews
articles.description: AB Aur b, a new exoplanet, has been found in the earliest part of its formation. Its birth is challenging what we know about planets forming.
articles.content: Scientists have observed an enormous planet about nine times the mass of Jupiter at a remarkably early stage of formation - describing it as still in the womb - in a discovery that challenges the cur… [+3566 chars]

articles.author: Michelle Starr
articles.title: The Most Distant Exoplanet Ever Found by Kepler Is... Surprisingly Familiar - ScienceAlert
articles.description: An exoplanet a whopping 17,000 light-years from Earth has been found hiding in data collected by the now-retired Kepler Space Telescope.
articles.content:
An exoplanet a whopping 17,000 light-years from Earth has been found hiding in data collected by the now-retired Kepler Space Telescope.
It's the most distant world ever picked up by the planet-hunt… [+5091 chars]

articles.title: UK Mars rover is casualty of war as science severs its links with Russia - The Guardian
